title: CBIC Revises Duty Drawback Rates for Gold & Silver Jewellery/Articles!
content:
# CBIC Revises Duty Drawback Rates for Gold & Silver Jewellery/Articles!

Ek important update hai for all exporters in the gems and jewellery sector! Government ne All Industry Rates (AIR) of Duty Drawback for gold and silver jewellery/articles revise kiye hain.

This revision has been announced by the Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) vide **Notification No. 21/2026–Customs (N.T.) dated February 16, 2026**.

**Key Highlights of the Revision:**

*   This notification amends the principal Notification No. 77/2023-Customs (N.T.) dated October 20, 2023.
*   The primary objective is to align drawback rates with current duty incidence and input cost structures. This move aims to adequately neutralize duties suffered on inputs for exported jewellery products.
*   It's expected to improve liquidity and enhance the export competitiveness for manufacturers and exporters.
*   **Revised Drawback Rates (per 10 grams unless specified):**
    *   **Tariff Item 711301 (Gold Jewellery):** Rate revised from ₹524.27 to ₹639.59.
    *   **Tariff Item 711302 (Gold Jewellery – Other categories):** Rate revised from ₹6317.22 to ₹9089.33.
    *   **Tariff Item 711401 (Silver Jewellery/Articles):** Rate revised from ₹6317.22 to ₹9089.33.
